example.eg: After reading that their favourite rock star would be visiting their town, the teenage girls spent the week in a state of expectation.
example.egtrans: 在读到自己最爱的摇滚明星会到访镇上后，少女们整周都在巴巴地盼望。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 期待, 期望, 盼望

example.eg: The old couple's expectation of seeing their son was ruined when he phoned to say he couldn't make it.
example.egtrans: 这对老夫妇本想见见自己的儿子，但儿子打电话来说回不来了，让他们的期盼落了空。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 期待, 盼望, 企盼

example.eg: The boss gave Helen the work with the expectation that it would be done well.
example.egtrans: 老板给海伦分配了工作，希望她能做好。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 预期, 期望, 希望

example.eg: James is poor now, but he has expectations; his rich aunt will almost certainly leave him all her money.
example.egtrans: 詹姆士现在很穷，但他还是有指望的：他富有的姑姑差不多一定会让他继承她所有的财富。

example.eg: I have no expectation that he will be able to answer my question, but I will ask him anyway.
Cameron's parents have high expectations for his future.
